revised_title: Investigating the General Circulation of the Atmosphere in Middle and Higher Latitudes
tldr: The author investigates the general circulation of the atmosphere in middle and higher latitudes, focusing on the motion of air and pressure gradients. The study suggests that the motion of air in these latitudes is more of a passage around the pole in a general easterly direction, with air moving from west to east and diverging in the northern hemisphere towards the north over the Pacific and Atlantic oceans.
